entries.question: How do I learn how to ask a good question on StackOverwhelm?
entries.author: Mark
entries.details: I know that this site has different conventions from the way that [StackOverflow does it](https://stackoverflow.com/help/how-to-ask). I'm curious where I can find out how to do that

entries.question: How do I determine whether my javaScript variable is a string or an integer?
entries.author: Becky with the good hair
entries.details: Hi I'm brand new to StackOverwhelm and I write run on sentences I'm just wondering how to tell whether my javaScript variable is a string or an integer

tips.details: You twit. This is such a shit question.
tips.author: Bellatrix Lestrange

tips.details: Great question! I think you might be able to make it even better if you pepper your explaination with a little more punctuation and include some example code if possible. But welcome! Clearly a popular question! Keep coding!
tips.author: Hermione Granger
